Cereal box can be used as a planter for small plants by cutting out the bottom of the box and filling it with soil, then adding small plants or herbs.
Cereal box can be used as a DIY bird feeder by cutting out a small hole in the top of the box and filling it with birdseed.
Cereal box can be used as a DIY birdhouse by cutting out the front and back of the box and leaving the sides open, then painting the box and adding a hanger.
Cereal box can be used as a DIY greenhouse by covering the box with clear plastic wrap and placing it in a sunny location.
Cereal box can be used as a DIY storage container for small items like pens, pencils, or paper clips by cutting out the top and bottom of the box and using it as a drawer.
